Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

Fabric.description: The Fabric schema represents a simple fabric consisting of one or more switches, zero or more endpoints, and zero or more zones.
Fabric.longDescription: This resource shall represent a simple switchable fabric for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

AddressPools.description: The collection of links to the address pools that this fabric contains.
AddressPools.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type AddressPoolCollection.

Connections.description: The collection of links to the connections that this fabric contains.
Connections.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ConnectionCollection.

EndpointGroups.description: The collection of links to the endpoint groups that this fabric contains.
EndpointGroups.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type EndpointGroupCollection.

Endpoints.description: The collection of links to the endpoints that this fabric contains.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type EndpointCollection.

FabricType.description: The protocol being sent over this fabric.
FabricType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of fabric being represented by this simple fabric.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

MaxZones.description: The maximum number of zones the switch can currently configure.
MaxZones.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of zones the switch can currently configure.  Changes in the logical or physical configuration of the system can change this value.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Switches.description: The collection of links to the switches that this fabric contains.
Switches.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type SwitchCollection.

UUID.longDescription: This property shall contain a universal unique identifier number for the fabric.

Zones.description: The collection of links to the zones that this fabric contains.
Zones.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ZoneCollection.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
